statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 4 \\ 14 \\ 18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ -4 \\ 12 \\ 24 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -2 \\ 6 \\ 12 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
